Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Detroit in 1976...
Traded from Detroit to Los Angeles on 1/31/1977 (Going to LA: CF K. Yamamoto, RF J. Clark. Going to DET: RF J. Burroughs, P D. Vossler, SS W. Randolph, C E. Rodriguez)...
Injured on 9/4/1977 with a Fractured Hand, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/1/1978, off Dennis Eckersley (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/1978, off Gary Nolan (PIT)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Pittsburgh on 5/5/1978...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1978, hitting .444 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (N) on 6/12/1980...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
